title: Na Sec & Prep Act Dty II
description: This course is designed for college seniors and provides them the foundation to understand their role as military officers and how they are directly tied to our National Security Strategy. It is an overview of the complex social and political issues facing the military profession and requires a measure of sophistication commensurate with the senior college level. Topics include: Leadership Authority and Responsibility, Military Justice, and Airmen Comprehensive Assessment. Leadership Laboratory is mandatory for AFROTC cadets and complements this course.
